p: Human parechoviruses (HPeVs) belong to the species Parechovirus A in the genus Parechovirus. Based on VP1, 19 types with different pathogenicity have been defined (see website of the picornavirus study group). While HPeV1 and 2 are associated with mild gastrointestinal and respiratory symptoms, HPeV3 may lead to sepsis-like illnesses mainly in neonates and infants ( Dunn, 2016).
